name: Rising Fox - Prototype
description:
Follow us! https://twitter.com/RisingFoxGame 

Hi there,
We are a group of passionate, videogame-freaks from Argentina.
Please allow us to share with you the prototype We've been working on for about 5 months. It's a 2D platformer with  metroidvania concepts. This is just a small prototype, feel free to enjoy the trip!  

You can see controls IN-GAME by pressing ESC key => Controls 

This version is designed for Keyboard + Mouse!

Gamepad SHOULD work :D

You can save progress and continue later,  Game will save whenever you rest at an altar, and whenever you gain a new ability :)

The proto should take between 30-50min to complete :D 

The game concept is originally designed to run in Windows/Desktop, but since the prototype handles a smaller scope, this was not-that-hard to make WebGL (thus browsers) compatible, we're still testing the web version, watch out for bugs!!!

More to come! Stay tuned in our social media.
Feel free to fill out our feedback form too https://risingfox.itch.io/rising-fox-proto#gamedev
Or just leave a message for us just below in the comments section!

Thanks! <3
